meanings.definition: A person who bakes bread, cakes, etc.
meanings.sent1: The baker kneaded the dough for the bread.
meanings.sent2: The local baker makes delicious pastries every morning.
meanings.sent3: Why did the baker always have a smile? Because he loved his job!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity in the kitchen turned her into a true baking artist, a master baker.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked goods from the baker's shop filled the street.

meanings.sent1: The baker was preheated before the dough was placed inside.
meanings.sent2: The new baker in the bakery helped increase bread production.
meanings.sent3: The baker beeped happily when the bread was ready.
meanings.sent4: The baker hummed a tune as it worked, like a cheerful kitchen assistant.
meanings.sent5: The baker's timer rang, signaling the perfect time to take out the bread.
